description:
This course is a technical walk-through of how to set up your own podcast in one day for a minimal cost. The cost is just $5/month for the hosting of your podcast which is an unavoidable cost.

Every brand or business can benefit from the massive exposure potential of a podcast, and in this course IÂ explain to you how to get over the technical challenges of setting up your own podcast to help you get up and running.

Go ahead and get this course, and get your podcast set up quickly and without any glitches or confusion. And begin getting more exposure for your business the very same day you enroll in this course.
title: How to set up a podcast in less than 1 day
